tableGroups.title: DataTable Toolbar Props
tableGroups.description: Props to enable/disable toolbar controls and customize toolbar behavior.

items.name: enableGlobalFilter
items.description: Enable global search input in the toolbar.

items.name: enableColumnFilter
items.description: Enable advanced column filtering button.

items.name: enableColumnVisibility
items.description: Enable column visibility dropdown.

items.name: enableColumnPinning
items.description: Enable column pinning control.

items.name: enableTableSizeControl
items.description: Enable table size/density control.

items.name: enableExport
items.description: Enable export button (CSV/Excel).

items.name: enableReset
items.description: Enable reset button to clear all settings.

items.name: extraFilter
items.description: Custom component(s) to add to toolbar right section.

slotPropGroups.title: toolbar - Main Toolbar Container
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the main toolbar container using slotProps.toolbar.

items.name: sx
items.description: MUI sx prop for styling the toolbar container.

items.name: title
items.description: Toolbar title text displayed at the top.

items.name: subtitle
items.description: Toolbar subtitle text displayed below title.

items.name: titleSx
items.description: Styling for the title Typography component.

items.name: subtitleSx
items.description: Styling for the subtitle Typography component.

items.name: containerSx
items.description: Styling for the toolbar container Box.

items.name: leftSectionSx
items.description: Styling for the left control section (search, filters, etc.).

items.name: rightSectionSx
items.description: Styling for the right section (extraFilter).

slotPropGroups.title: searchInput - Search Control
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the global search input component using slotProps.searchInput.

items.name: placeholder
items.description: Placeholder text for the search input.

items.name: autoFocus
items.description: Auto-focus the input when it becomes visible.

items.name: inputProps
items.description: Props passed to the underlying OutlinedInput component.

items.name: searchIconProps
items.description: Props for the search icon button (trigger).

items.name: clearIconProps
items.description: Props for the clear icon button.

items.name: containerSx
items.description: Styling for the container Box.

items.name: tooltipProps
items.description: Props for the search icon tooltip.

slotPropGroups.title: columnVisibilityControl - Column Visibility Dropdown
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the column visibility control using slotProps.columnVisibilityControl.

items.name: title
items.description: Menu dropdown title text.

items.name: titleSx
items.description: Styling for the title Typography component.

items.name: menuSx
items.description: Styling for the menu container Box.

items.name: checkboxProps
items.description: Props for column visibility checkboxes.

items.name: labelProps
items.description: Props for checkbox labels.

slotPropGroups.title: columnCustomFilterControl - Advanced Column Filters
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the column filter control using slotProps.columnCustomFilterControl.

items.name: title
items.description: Filter dialog title text.

items.name: titleSx
items.description: Styling for the title Typography component.

items.name: menuSx
items.description: Styling for the filter menu container.

items.name: iconButtonProps
items.description: Props for the filter icon button.

items.name: badgeProps
items.description: Props for the active filter count badge.

items.name: addButtonProps
items.description: Props for the 'Add Filter' button.

items.name: applyButtonProps
items.description: Props for the 'Apply' button.

items.name: clearButtonProps
items.description: Props for the 'Clear All' button.

items.name: logicSelectProps
items.description: Props for the AND/OR logic select dropdown.

items.name: deleteButtonProps
items.description: Props for filter delete buttons.

slotPropGroups.title: columnPinningControl - Column Pinning Control
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the column pinning control using slotProps.columnPinningControl.

items.name: title
items.description: Menu dropdown title text.

items.name: titleSx
items.description: Styling for the title Typography component.

items.name: menuSx
items.description: Styling for the menu container Box.

items.name: iconButtonProps
items.description: Props for the pin icon button.

items.name: tooltipProps
items.description: Props for the tooltip.

items.name: badgeProps
items.description: Props for the pinned count badge.

items.name: clearButtonProps
items.description: Props for the 'Unpin All' button.

slotPropGroups.title: tableSizeControl - Table Density Control
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the table size control using slotProps.tableSizeControl.

items.name: iconButtonProps
items.description: Props for the size control icon button.

items.name: tooltipProps
items.description: Props for the tooltip.

items.name: containerSx
items.description: Styling for menu items container.

items.name: menuProps
items.description: Props for the dropdown menu.

slotPropGroups.title: resetButton - Reset Control
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the reset control using slotProps.resetButton.

items.name: iconButtonProps
items.description: Props for the reset icon button.

items.name: tooltipProps
items.description: Props for the tooltip.

items.name: resetActions
items.description: Actions to reset. Options: 'columnOrder', 'columnPinning', 'columnSizing', 'columnVisibility', 'filters', 'sorting', 'pagination'.

slotPropGroups.title: exportButton - Export Control
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the export control using slotProps.exportButton.

items.name: exportFilename
items.description: Default filename for exports (without extension).

items.name: iconButtonProps
items.description: Props for the export icon button.

items.name: tooltipProps
items.description: Props for the tooltip.

items.name: menuSx
items.description: Styling for the export menu container.

items.name: menuItemProps
items.description: Props for menu items (CSV, Excel).

items.name: onServerExport
items.description: Custom server-side export handler. Function signature: (filters?: Partial<TableFilters>, selection?: SelectionState) => Promise<{ data: T[]; total: number }>.

items.name: onExportProgress
items.description: Progress callback during export. Function signature: (progress: { processedRows?: number; totalRows?: number; percentage?: number }) => void.

items.name: onExportComplete
items.description: Completion callback. Function signature: (result: { success: boolean; filename: string; totalRows: number }) => void.

items.name: onExportError
items.description: Error callback. Function signature: (error: { message: string; code: string }) => void.

slotPropGroups.title: bulkActionsToolbar - Bulk Actions Toolbar
slotPropGroups.description: Customize the bulk actions toolbar using slotProps.bulkActionsToolbar.

items.name: sx
items.description: MUI sx prop for styling the toolbar container.

items.name: chipProps
items.description: Props for the selection count chip.

items.name: containerSx
items.description: Styling for the container (same as sx).

items.name: leftSectionSx
items.description: Styling for the left section (selection info).

items.name: rightSectionSx
items.description: Styling for the right section (action buttons).

items.name: fadeProps
items.description: Props for the fade animation component.
